name: Makarov PMM magazine
description: The standard magazine for the Modernized Makarov pistol, holds 10 rounds.

name: Extended Makarov PMM magazine
description: A slightly extended version of the magazine for the Modernized Makarov pistol, holds 12 rounds.

name: Fort-12 magazine

name: APS magazine
